name: Abigor (Crimson Knight Studios, dest74)
description: Abigor is a Third Person Action Adventure game taking place in the Alastor Demon Hunting Academy over a three day period, where you will learn how to use various weapons, cast magical spells, and fight a variety of demons before an epic final battle. There are only 3 days until final exams for the current class of demon hunters. However, Abigor plans to invade the school on the third day in a mission of vengeance and conquest. The duty falls upon Alric, our hero, to defeat Abigor; thus showing that he is on his way to become one of the most powerful and notorious demon hunters of all time.
